short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save bits of content you consume for future use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Verine makes it easy to save bits of content you consume for future use. Select the content you want, right click, and add it to Verine.

Use your saved content to take notes, sharing it with your audience, or anything you want.
